attributes.mlflow.spanInputs: {"prompt": "Generate Cisco IOS XR 7.0.1 telemetry configuration to monitor L2VPN xconnect/pseudowire operational state. Use gRPC with no TLS. Telemetry server address is 192.0.2.110 with port 57500. Choose relevant sensor-paths."}
attributes.mlflow.spanOutputs:
"telemetry model-driven
 sensor-group L2VPN-XCONNECT-STATE
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-oper:l2vpnv2/active/xconnects/xconnect/segment2/pseudo-wire/remote-signalling/tlv
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-oper:l2vpnv2/active/xconnect-mp2mp-ce2ces/xconnect-mp2mp-ce2ce/segment1/pseudo-wire/remote-signalling/tlv
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-oper:l2vpnv2/active/xconnect-mp2mp-ce2ces/xconnect-mp2mp-ce2ce/segment2/pseudo-wire/remote-signalling/tlv
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-oper:l2vpnv2/active/xconnect-mp2mp-ce2ces/xconnect-mp2mp-ce2ce/backup/pseudo-wire/remote-signalling/tlv
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-oper:l2vpnv2/active/xconnect-mp2mp-ce2ces/xconnect-mp2mp-ce2ce/segment2/pseudo-wire/local-signalling/tlv
 !
 destination-group DG-GRPC
  address-family ipv4
   destination 192.0.2.110
    port 57500
    encoding self-describing-gpb
    protocol grpc no-tls
 !
 subscription SUB-L2VPN-XCONNECT
  sensor-group-id L2VPN-XCONNECT-STATE sample-interval 30000
  destination-group-id DG-GRPC
 !"
